show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #42 Phillip Meece "Measuring the Metrics of Success"
subtitle: #42 Phillip Meece "Measuring the Metrics of Success"
summary:
Our friend Phillip Meece from The Carnivore Bar joins us today to talk about his journey from the theater world of make believe combat to being a combat medic in Afghanistan and why he went on to create the carnivore bar.

Buy Carnivore Bars here:
